name: Unshaped Brew
description: It's like potion of invisibility, but potion of unshapebility.
effect: Once per turn, you can roll a dice for this card. On the roll of 1, discard this card. On the roll 2-6, your hero can move through adversaries until the end of turn. On the roll of 5 or 6, they gain +1 Move as well.
